method.name: PingStart
method.tp:docstring: Starts pinging the specified hostname with the specified options, with output directed to the given output file descriptor. The returned opaque string functions as a handle for this particular ping.

arg.name: outfd
arg.tp:docstring: File descriptor to send output to.

arg.name: options
arg.tp:docstring: Options to pass to the ping command. Accepted keys include: count (int default 4): Number of packets to send. interval (int): Time to wait between packets. numeric (bool): Print numeric remote hosts. packetsize (int): Size of each packet sent. waittime (int): Time to wait for a response. Unrecognized keys return a DBus error and print no output to the supplied file descriptor.

method.name: PingStop
method.arg: Handle to the ping to stop. If an empty string is passed, stops all running pings.
